RDT10 - Class in TCP
Implements simulator using rdt1.0 protocol

Constructs an RDT10 simulator with given munge factor

RTDBase - Class in TCP
The base class for each of the RTD simulations
RTDBase(double, double, String) - Constructor for class TCP.RTDBase
Constructs the RTDBase class with forward and backward channels
RTDBase(double, double, String, int) - Constructor for class TCP.RTDBase
Constructs the RTDBase class with forward and backward channels
RTDBase.RReceiver - Class in TCP
Base class for all RReceiver Classes
RTDBase.RSender - Class in TCP
Base class for all RSender Classes
run() - Method in class TCP.FSM
Used by thread to repeatedly call loop
run() - Method in class TCP.RTDBase
Starts threads in forward, backward, sender, receiver and sp.
run() - Method in class TCP.StringPitcher
Reads lines of file text to be piped to reader of this StringPitcher
run() - Method in class TCP.UChannel
Reads input data provided by send; introduces bit errors; writes data to receive, or loses packet
